Header.Original: [08 Jul 2008] DSA-1604-1 bind - DNS cache poisoning

Annotations.Original: NOTE: <unfixed> (backport too complicated, solution: upgrade to bind9 or have bind8 forward queries to a bind9 resolver)
Annotations.Description: <unfixed> (backport too complicated, solution: upgrade to bind9 or have bind8 forward queries to a bind9 resolver)

Annotations.Original: NOTE: DSA issued as an avisory about actions user can take to protect against this vulnerability
